analysis.summary: The CV demonstrates a solid foundation in backend development and data automation but needs significant tailoring to align with the requirements of an AI Engineer role. The candidate should focus on highlighting AI-related skills, experiences, and projects. Improvement in formatting and clarity will also be beneficial.
critical_issues: Inconsistent use of bolding and capitalization.
The resume lacks specific details about AI-related skills, considering the target role of AI Engineer.
The description of the 'Sonotrak' role is too detailed for a non-technical position and doesn't highlight transferable skills well.
The 'Education' section shows ongoing studies, which might be seen as a negative if not balanced with relevant experience.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Resourceful Developer with hands- on experience in backend development and data automation.
inline_suggestions.problem: The summary is generic and doesn't highlight any specific achievements or AI-related skills.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Rewrite the summary to highlight AI-related skills and quantifiable achievements.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Results-driven Developer experienced in backend development, data automation, and machine learning. Proficient in Python, Flask, and data analysis techniques.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Engineering Degree in Data Science – 1ﬆ Year
inline_suggestions.problem: Specifying '1st Year' might be seen as a negative. It's better to emphasize relevant coursework or skills gained so far.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Rephrase to focus on relevant coursework or skills.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Engineering Degree in Data Science (Expected Graduation: [Year])

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: JavaScript, Python, Web Services, C, HTML5, CSS, SQL, User Interface, Assembly, Docker, Linux, Git
inline_suggestions.problem: Skills section is too broad. Highlight skills most relevant to AI Engineering and expand on AI-specific technologies.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Prioritize and expand on relevant skills, adding AI-specific keywords.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, Docker, Linux, Git, Machine Learning (Scikit-learn), Data Analysis, Web Scraping

inline_suggestions.problem: The 'Present' date is in the future. Assume this is a typo and change to an earlier date, or 'Present' is only true if the resume creation date is after March 2025, but unlikely.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Confirm and correct date if an error, and elaborate on achievements to showcase skills.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Worked with clients to automate repetitive tasks, improve data collection efﬁciency, and deliver clean, usable datasets
inline_suggestions.problem: This is vague. Quantify the improvements whenever possible.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Add specific metrics to quantify the improvements.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Automated repetitive tasks for clients, resulting in a 20% improvement in data collection efficiency and delivery of clean, usable datasets.

inline_suggestions.problem: This role is not directly relevant to an AI Engineering position. The description focuses on customer service and software limitations, not transferable technical skills.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Condense the description to one line and focus on transferable skills if possible, or remove it if it does not demonstrate relevant skills.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Sonotrak (Ticketing Agent): Proposed digital transformation plan to improve ticketing flexibility and user experience.

inline_suggestions.problem: This skill is not directly relevant to an AI engineer role and can be removed to save space.

While the description is good, it doesn't explicitly mention any AI-related aspects or data analysis techniques used. Did you perform any sentiment analysis or create any predictive models based on the data?
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Add details about any AI or data analysis techniques used in the project.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Subreddit Activity Tracker: ... [Add sentence about sentiment analysis, predictive modeling, etc., if applicable.]

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Created and launched a small clothing brand focused on personalized t- shirt designs
inline_suggestions.problem: While showing entrepreneurial spirit, this project is not directly related to the target job description. Consider if it demonstrates any relevant skills.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Unless the skill demonstrated is highly relevant, consider removing this section to save space.

section_analysis: Demonstrates experience with relevant technologies like Python, Flask, and PostgreSQL.
Includes project examples showcasing practical application of skills.
Highlights experience in web scraping and data automation, which are valuable for AI applications.
quick_wins: Explicitly mention AI-related skills, libraries, or frameworks used in projects (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn).
Tailor the 'Work Experience' section to emphasize skills relevant to AI engineering, even in non-technical roles.
Provide more detail about the 'Engineering Degree' to make it more relevant to the AI Engineer role.
top_priorities: Tailor experience descriptions to emphasize transferable skills relevant to AI Engineering.
Improve formatting and correct special characters.

issues: Inconsistent use of bolding and capitalization.
